title: Like That There (CRS032)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Joe Mulligan first shared on the podcast in June of 2014 about a very strange peyote trip.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Joe Mulligan, kevin Allison)
